title: Early Fusion (Feature-Level Fusion)
description: Discuss different approaches for combining multimodal data, such as early fusion (feature-level), late fusion (decision-level), and hybrid fusion.

examples.description: Utilizes a fusion-separation mechanism to combine EEG and ECG modalities, allowing independent utilization of features from both for enhanced accuracy (hybrid fusion).
examples.note: Added for its use of a fusion-separation mechanism to effectively combine EEG and ECG modalities, demonstrating a hybrid fusion approach.

examples.description: Employs a feature fusion module (FFM) that integrates spatial and temporal features using channel attention mechanisms (hybrid fusion).
examples.note: Added for its employment of a feature fusion module that integrates spatial and temporal features, illustrating a hybrid fusion approach.

trend: Exploration of various fusion strategies to maximize the benefits of multimodal data integration.
